```{r}

#| label: load-pkgs
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
```

```{r}
#| label: load-data-1

march_madness <- read_csv("data/Tournament_Data.csv")

march_madness <- march_madness |>
  filter(round != 0 & round != 68) |>
  mutate(
    round = as.factor(round)
  )

names(march_madness)

```

```{r}
march_madness |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = round, y = wins_above_bubble)) +
  geom_boxplot()


```
